title: Daozi - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Cultivation   Handsome Male Lead   Overpowered Protagonist   Power Couple   Secret Identity
author: 渣三快住手
description:
Everyone who lived on the continent of Jiuhua knew that Xie Xuanyang was a fine young man. He was the most outstanding of his generation, with many great achievements under his name. An accomplished Sword Cultivator two steps away from transcendence, he was kind and took great pleasure in helping others. 

And then one day… they realized that this ‘good man’ had deceived them all.>
